page.title: 13RELIGION, GRAINTHORPE
page.content: Grainthorpe has a 14th Century Church and a 19th Century Chapel;inside the last decade two other chapels have disappeared.Methodists are in the majority and most of the children attend the Chapel Sunday School,the church not having had one for the last twenty years. Sunday School by a 7 year old girl. On Sunday I went to Sunday School. We sang "Kum ba yah",and "One more step along the road I go",in the chapel.Then we went into the Sunday school room and we made a mosaic cross. A mosaic is a pattern made of stones. In the Chancel is a fragment of a foliated brass cross.The centre of the head has a four leaved ornament enclosing a cross.The base rests on a rock in the sea in which swim 5 fishes. Date c 1384.
